title: My mmr went down the drain after going inactive for less than a month
body: So i was in d4 and used to play ranked a lot. I stopped playing ranked because i got tired of the dynamic queue system ( which i seriously think needs to have some tweaks for solo players). After about 25 days i played a ranked game and when previously i was getting about +18 lp and losing 10, now im gaining +10 or less and losing 20 lp a game. I would like to know the reason for this if possible. Thanks.
